kit.leader_skill: INT Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Special Beam Cannon (Clone) (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK and; raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

passive_skill.name: All-Out Synergy
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +1; (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) "Tournament Participants" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 30% up, plus an additional Ki +1 and DEF 30% up for characters who also belong to the "Representatives of Universe 7" Category; When HP is 80% or less: Attacks guaranteed to hit; If HP is 80% or less when attacking: Seals the attacked enemy's Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; When there is another "Representatives of Universe 7" Category ally attacking in the same turn: ATK & DEF 100% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Representatives of Universe 7" Category characters: Guards all attacks

lines.text: "Tournament Participants" Category allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 30% up, plus an additional Ki +1 and DEF 30% up for characters who also belong to the "Representatives of Universe 7" Category
Seals the attacked enemy's Super Attack
lines.context: If HP is 80% or less when attacking
When attacking with 12 or more Ki
When there is another "Representatives of Universe 7" Category ally attacking in the same turn
When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Representatives of Universe 7" Category characters
